snippet.title: Hexarchy - Pre-Alpha 2020 - 4x game at 4x speed
snippet.description:
Early alpha footage sped up.
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1356810/Hexarchy/
Sign up on our website for free access to beta version: https://www.maintanksoftware.com/hexarchy.html
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/rySTNdz

Hexarchy is a fast-paced strategy game. It's built from the ground-up for multiplayer. All players take their turn simultaneously and games take less than an hour, even with 10 players.
